name: VR Space Station Prototype for Oculus
name_original: VR Space Station Prototype for Oculus
description:
This is prototype I made to test zero g movement in VR.  I think it's fun just to float around.  I'm not what I'm going to do with this but thought I'd post it in case anyone wanted to give it a try.

Controls:

You can use your hands to swim around while inside the station. Once you're outside, you use the left joystick as a thruster.

PC Build: To quit, hit the left menu button which brings up the in-game menu then select Quit with the left trigger.
